author: pyang
msg: Apply patch for HARMONY-2760 ([classlib][security]Provider.constructor throws NullPointerException while name or info is null while RI does not.)

author: ndbeyer

author: gvanmatre
msg: Fix for the Tomahawk jscookmenu component not rendering (Shale364).  The problem was reported by Steve Olson.  This patch adds the rendererType to the Clay XML configuration files.  The Clay full views now explicitly set the content type of the response.

author: hogstrom
msg: Updated CXF dependency from common-metacode to metacode in line with released version

author: husted
msg: WW-1522 Automatic Alias ActionConfigs - Initial unit tests are passing, but when integrating the provider into the runime code, an exception is thrown.

Caused by: com.opensymphony.xwork2.inject.ContainerImpl$MissingDependencyException: No mapping found for dependency [type=org.apache.struts2.dispatcher.mapper.ActionMapper, name='default'] in public static void org.apache.struts2.dispatcher.FilterDispatcher.setActionMapper(org.apache.struts2.dispatcher.mapper.ActionMapper).
